languages.text: "Император, какая же невыносимо самодовольная, надменная, по-детски наглая тварь... Как в одном Вольном Торговце могло собраться все, за что их так не любят?"
"Emperor, what an insufferably smug, arrogant, and childishly insolent creature... How can a single Rogue Trader embody everything they are loathed for?"
languages.original_text: "Император, какая же невыносимо самодовольная, надменная, по-детски наглая тварь... Как в одном Вольном Торговце могло собраться все, за что их так не любят?"

traits.locale_text: "Emperor, what an insufferably smug, arrogant, and childishly insolent creature... How can a single Rogue Trader embody everything they are loathed for?"

languages.text: « Par l'Empereur, quelle insupportable créature ! Sa suffisance et son arrogance n'ont d'égale que son insolence... Comment {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} peut-{mf|il|elle} incarner tout ce que les gens détestent ? »
languages.original_text: "Emperor, what an insufferably smug, arrogant, and childishly insolent creature... How can a single Rogue Trader embody everything they are loathed for?"

traits.locale_text: « Par l'Empereur, quelle insupportable créature ! Sa suffisance et son arrogance n'ont d'égale que son insolence... Comment {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} peut-{mf|il|elle} incarner tout ce que les gens détestent ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Emperador, menudo ser tan arrogante, altanero e insolente... ¿cómo puede un{mf||a} sol{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente personificar todo aquello por lo que se les odia?».
languages.original_text: "Emperor, what an insufferably smug, arrogant, and childishly insolent creature... How can a single Rogue Trader embody everything they are loathed for?"

traits.locale_text: «Emperador, menudo ser tan arrogante, altanero e insolente... ¿cómo puede un{mf||a} sol{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente personificar todo aquello por lo que se les odia?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “帝皇在上，这个人简直是个自鸣得意、傲慢自大、趾高气扬的怪物……身为行商浪人，怎么会拥有这一切本该摒弃的品质？”
languages.original_text: "Emperor, what an insufferably smug, arrogant, and childishly insolent creature... How can a single Rogue Trader embody everything they are loathed for?"

traits.locale_text: “帝皇在上，这个人简直是个自鸣得意、傲慢自大、趾高气扬的怪物……身为行商浪人，怎么会拥有这一切本该摒弃的品质？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「皇帝陛下、なんと我慢できないほど独りよがりで、傲慢で、子供じみた横柄な生き物なのでしょうか…たった一人の自由開拓者が、彼らが嫌悪するすべてを体現できるというのでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "Emperor, what an insufferably smug, arrogant, and childishly insolent creature... How can a single Rogue Trader embody everything they are loathed for?"

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝陛下、なんと我慢できないほど独りよがりで、傲慢で、子供じみた横柄な生き物なのでしょうか…たった一人の自由開拓者が、彼らが嫌悪するすべてを体現できるというのでしょう？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Der Imperator, welch unerträglich überhebliche, arrogante und kindisch anmaßende Kreatur ... Wie kann ein einziger Freihändler alles verkörpern, wofür sie verhasst sind?"
languages.original_text: "Emperor, what an insufferably smug, arrogant, and childishly insolent creature... How can a single Rogue Trader embody everything they are loathed for?"

traits.locale_text: "Der Imperator, welch unerträglich überhebliche, arrogante und kindisch anmaßende Kreatur ... Wie kann ein einziger Freihändler alles verkörpern, wofür sie verhasst sind?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Nasıl da katlanılmaz bir ukala, küstah ve çocuk gibi arsız bir yaratık... Tek bir Hür Tacir nasıl olur da istemediği her şeye sahip olabilir?"
languages.original_text: "Emperor, what an insufferably smug, arrogant, and childishly insolent creature... How can a single Rogue Trader embody everything they are loathed for?"
